<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.19
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
<I>
	Execution Version
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT AGREEMENT NO. 2
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	THIS AMENDMENT AGREEMENT NO.&nbsp;2 (this &#147;Amendment&#148;), dated as of October&nbsp;30, 2015, is made among NanoString Technologies,
	Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#147;Borrower&#148;), the Subsidiary Guarantors listed on the signature pages hereof under the heading &#147;SUBSIDIARY GUARANTORS&#148; (each a &#147;Subsidiary Guarantor&#148; and, collectively, the
	&#147;Subsidiary Guarantors&#148;, and together with the Borrower, each an &#147;Obligor&#148; and, collectively, the &#147;Obligors&#148;) and the Lenders listed on the signature pages hereof under the heading &#147;LENDERS&#148; (each a
	&#147;Lender&#148; and, collectively, the &#147;Lenders&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Obligors and the Lenders are parties to that certain Term Loan
	Agreement, dated as of April&nbsp;1, 2014, amended by that certain Amendment Agreement No.&nbsp;1, dated as of April&nbsp;16, 2015 (as further amended, amended and restated, modified or supplemented from time to time, the &#147;Loan
	Agreement&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The parties hereto desire to amend the Loan Agreement on the terms and subject to the conditions set forth herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Accordingly, the parties hereto agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;1
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Definitions; Interpretation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
<B>
	Terms Defined in Loan Agreement
</B>
	. All
	capitalized terms used in this Amendment (including in the recitals hereof) and not otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)
<B>
	Interpretation
</B>
	. The rules of interpretation set forth in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1.03
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement shall be applicable to this
	Amendment and are incorporated herein by this reference.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;2
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Amendments.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Subject to
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
	, the Loan Agreement is hereby amended as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) The following definitions shall be added to
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1.01
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement in alphabetical sequence:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Amendment No.&nbsp;1
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means that Amendment Agreement No.&nbsp;1, dated as of April&nbsp;16, 2015, among
	Borrower, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Lenders signatory thereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Amendment No.&nbsp;2
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means that
	Amendment Agreement No.&nbsp;2, dated as of October&nbsp;30, 2015, among Borrower, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Lenders signatory thereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Closing Date
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means October&nbsp;30, 2015.
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Fee Letter
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means that fee letter agreement dated as of October&nbsp;30, 2015 between Borrower
	and the Lenders party thereto.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage157"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) The following definitions in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1.01
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement are hereby
	amended and restated in their entirety to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Borrowing Notice Date
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means, (i)&nbsp;in the
	case of the first Borrowing, a date that is at least twelve Business Days prior to the Borrowing Date of such Borrowing, (ii)&nbsp;in the case of a subsequent Borrowing (except for the Borrowing for the fifth tranche of term loans), a date that is
	at least twenty Business Days prior to the Borrowing Date of such Borrowing, and (iii)&nbsp;in the case of the Borrowing for the fifth tranche of term loans, a date that is at least twenty Business Days prior to the Borrowing Date of such Borrowing,
	or, in each case, such shorter period as the Lenders may agree.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Closing Date
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means April&nbsp;17, 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Commitment
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means, with respect to each Lender, the obligation of such Lender to make Loans to Borrower in accordance
	with the terms and conditions of this Agreement, which commitment is in the amount set forth opposite such Lender&#146;s name on
<B>
	Schedule 1
</B>
	under the caption &#147;Commitment&#148;, as such Schedule may be amended from time to time. The
	aggregate Commitments on the date of Amendment No.&nbsp;2 equal $60,000,000. For purposes of clarification, the amount of any PIK Loans shall not reduce the amount of the available Commitment.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Commitment Period
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means the period from and including the Closing Date and through and including December&nbsp;31,
	2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Interest-Only Period
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means the period from and including the first Borrowing Date and through and
	including the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	twenty-eighth
</FONT>
	(28
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	)&nbsp;Payment Date following the first Borrowing Date, which Payment Date shall be March&nbsp;31, 2021.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Loan Documents
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means, collectively, this Agreement, the Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Fee Letter, the Notes, the Security
	Documents, any subordination agreement or any intercreditor agreement entered into by Lenders with any other creditors of Obligors, and any other present or future document, instrument, agreement or certificate executed by Obligors for the benefit
	of Lenders in connection with this Agreement or any of the other Loan Documents, all as amended, restated, or otherwise modified.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	Maturity Date
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means the earlier to occur of (i)&nbsp;the thirty-second (32
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	nd
</SUP>
	)&nbsp;Payment Date following the first Borrowing Date, which Payment Date shall be March&nbsp;31, 2022, and (ii)&nbsp;the date on which the Loans are accelerated pursuant to
<B>
	Section&nbsp;11.02
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
<I>
	PIK Period
</I>
</B>
	&#148; means the period beginning on the first Borrowing Date through and
	including the earlier to occur of (i)&nbsp;the twenty-fourth (24
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	)&nbsp;Payment Date after the first Borrowing Date, which Payment Date shall be March&nbsp;31, 2020, and (ii)&nbsp;the date on
	which any Default shall have occurred (
<I>
	provided that
</I>
	if such Default shall have been cured or waived, the PIK Period shall resume until the earlier to occur of the next Default and the twenty-fourth (24
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	)&nbsp;Payment Date after the first Borrowing Date).&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage158"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2.01
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety
	to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	2.01 Commitments
</B>
	. Each Lender agrees severally, on and subject to the terms and conditions of this
	Agreement (including
<B>
	Section&nbsp;6
</B>
	), to make up to five tranches of term loans (provided that PIK Loans shall be deemed not to constitute &#147;term loans&#148; for purposes of this
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2.01
</B>
	) to Borrower, each on a Business
	Day during the Commitment Period in Dollars in an aggregate principal amount for such Lender not to exceed such Lender&#146;s Commitment;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	,
<I>
	however
</I>
	, that at no time shall any Lender be obligated to make a Loan (other than PIK
	Loans) in excess of such Lender&#146;s Proportionate Share of the amount by which the then effective Commitments exceeds the aggregate principal amount of Loans outstanding at such time. Amounts of Loans repaid may not be reborrowed.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d)
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.02(a)
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Interest Generally
</B>
	. Subject to
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.02(d)
</B>
	, Borrower agrees to pay to the Lenders interest on the unpaid
	principal amount of the Loans and the amount of all other outstanding Obligations, in the case of the Loans, for the period from the applicable Borrowing Date, and in the case of any other Obligation, from the date such other Obligation is due and
	payable, in each case, until paid in full, (A)&nbsp;from the first Borrowing Date to but excluding the Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Closing Date, at a rate
<I>
	per annum
</I>
	equal to 12.50%, and (B)&nbsp;from and including the Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Closing
	Date, at a rate
<I>
	per annum
</I>
	equal to 12.00%.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e)
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.02(d)
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement is hereby amended and
	restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	Paid In-Kind Interest
</B>
	. Notwithstanding
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.01(a)
</B>
	, at any time
	during the PIK Period, Borrower may elect to pay the interest on the outstanding principal amount of the Loans payable pursuant to
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.01
</B>
	as follows: (A)&nbsp;from the first Borrowing Date to but excluding the Amendment No.&nbsp;2
	Closing Date, (i)&nbsp;only 9.00% of the 12.50%&nbsp;
<I>
	per annum
</I>
	interest in cash and (ii)&nbsp;3.50% of the 12.50%&nbsp;
<I>
	per annum
</I>
	interest as compounded interest, added to the aggregate principal amount of the Loans, and (B)&nbsp;from
	and including the Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Closing Date, (i)&nbsp;only 9.00% of the 12.00%&nbsp;
<I>
	per annum
</I>
	interest in cash and (ii)&nbsp;3.00% of the 12.00%&nbsp;
<I>
	per annum
</I>
	interest as compounded interest, added to the aggregate principal
	amount of the Loans (the amount of any such compounded interest being a &#147;
<B>
<I>
	PIK Loan
</I>
</B>
	&#148;). At the request of the Lenders, each PIK Loan may be evidenced by a Note in the form of
<B>
	Exhibit C-2
</B>
	. The principal amount of each PIK
	Loan shall accrue interest in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement applicable to the Loans.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f)
<B>
	Section&nbsp;6.03
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;
<B>
	6.03
	Conditions to Subsequent Borrowings.
</B>
	The obligation of each Lender to make a Loan as part of subsequent Borrowings of a third, fourth and fifth tranche of term loans is subject to the following conditions precedent:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) In the case of the third Borrowing:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i)
<B>
	Borrowing Date
</B>
	. Such Borrowing must occur on or prior to December&nbsp;31, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage159"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii)
<B>
	Amount of Borrowing
</B>
	. The amount of such Borrowing shall be $10,000,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) In the case of the fourth Borrowing:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i)
<B>
	Borrowing Date
</B>
	. Such Borrowing must occur on or prior to June&nbsp;30, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii)
<B>
	Amount of Borrowing
</B>
	. The amount of such Borrowing shall be $5,000,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii)
<B>
	Third Borrowing.
</B>
	A third Borrowing of $10,000,000 shall have occurred.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c) In the case of the fifth Borrowing:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i)
<B>
	Borrowing Date
</B>
	. Such Borrowing shall occur on or prior to December&nbsp;31, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii)
<B>
	Amount of Borrowing
</B>
	. A total of up to $15,000,000 shall be available to Borrower under this
<B>
	Section&nbsp;6.03(c)
</B>
	in one
	Borrowing. Subject to such availability limit, such Borrowing, and the amount borrowed, is at Borrower&#146;s option.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii)
<B>
	Third and
	Fourth Borrowings.
</B>
	A third and fourth Borrowing totaling $15,000,000 shall have occurred.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(g)
<B>
	Schedule 1
</B>
	of the Loan
	Agreement is hereby replaced in its entirety by
<B>
	Schedule 1
</B>
	attached hereto.
</P>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;3
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Conditions of Effectiveness.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The effectiveness of
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
	shall be subject to the
	following conditions precedent:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) The Obligors and all of the Lenders shall have duly executed and delivered this Amendment and the
	Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Fee Letter pursuant to
<B>
	Section&nbsp;12.04
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) The Obligors shall have paid or
	reimbursed Lenders for Lenders&#146; reasonable out of pocket costs and expenses incurred in connection with this Amendment and the Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Fee Letter, including Lenders&#146; reasonable out of pocket legal fees and costs, pursuant to
<B>
	Section&nbsp;12.03(a)(i)(z)
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c) The Obligors shall have provided the Lenders (i)&nbsp;certified copies of
	the resolutions of the Board of Directors (or shareholders, if applicable) of each Obligor authorizing the making and performance by it of this Amendment and the Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Fee Letter, and (ii)&nbsp;official certificates of good standing
	in their jurisdictions of organization, dated no earlier than 30 days prior to the date hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d) The representations and warranties in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;4
</B>
	shall be true and correct on the date hereof and on the first date on which the conditions set forth in
<B>
	Sections 3(a), (b)&nbsp;and (c)&nbsp;
</B>
	shall have been satisfied.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	4
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage160"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;4
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Representations and Warranties; Reaffirmation.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) Each Obligor hereby represents and
	warrants to each Lender as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(i) Such Obligor has full power, authority and legal right to make and perform this Amendment and the
	Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Fee Letter. This Amendment and the Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Fee Letter are within such Obligor&#146;s corporate powers and have been duly authorized by all necessary corporate and, if required, by all necessary shareholder action.
	This Amendment and the Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Fee Letter have been duly executed and delivered by such Obligor and constitute legal, valid and binding obligations of such Obligor, enforceable against such Obligor in accordance with their terms, except
	as such enforceability may be limited by (a)&nbsp;bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium or similar laws of general applicability affecting the enforcement of creditors&#146; rights and (b)&nbsp;the application of general principles of
	equity (regardless of whether such enforceability is considered in a proceeding in equity or at law). Each of this Amendment and the Amendment No.&nbsp;2 Fee Letter (x)&nbsp;does not require any consent or approval of, registration or filing with,
	or any other action by, any Governmental Authority or any third party, except for such as have been obtained or made and are in full force and effect, (y)&nbsp;will not violate any applicable law or regulation or the charter, bylaws or other
	organizational documents of such Obligor and its Subsidiaries or any order of any Governmental Authority, other than any such violations that, individually or in the aggregate, could not reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect,
	(z)&nbsp;will not violate or result in an event of default under any material indenture, agreement or other instrument binding upon such Obligor and its Subsidiaries or assets, or give rise to a right thereunder to require any payment to be made by
	any such Person.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(ii) No Default has occurred or is continuing or will result after giving effect to this Amendment.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iii) The representations and warranties made by or with respect to such Obligor in
<B>
	Section&nbsp;7
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement are true in
	all material respects (taking into account any changes made to schedules updated in accordance with
<B>
	Section&nbsp;7.21
</B>
	of the Loan Agreement), except that such representations and warranties that refer to a specific earlier date were true in
	all material respects on such earlier date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(iv) There has been no Material Adverse Effect since the date of the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) Each Obligor hereby ratifies, confirms, reaffirms, and acknowledges its obligations under the Loan Documents to which it is a party and
	agrees that the Loan Documents remain in full force and effect, undiminished by this Amendment, except as expressly provided herein. By executing this Amendment, each Obligor acknowledges that it has read, consulted with its attorneys regarding, and
	understands, this Amendment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;5
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Governing Law; Submission To Jurisdiction; Waiver Of Jury Trial.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
<B>
	Governing
	Law
</B>
	. This Amendment and the rights and obligations of the parties hereunder shall be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the law of the State of New York, without regard to principles of conflicts of laws that would result in the
	application of the laws of any other jurisdiction;
<I>
	provided that
</I>
	Section&nbsp;5-1401 of the New York General Obligations Law shall apply.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	5
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage161"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)
<B>
	Submission to Jurisdiction
</B>
	. Each Obligor agrees that any suit, action or proceeding
	with respect to this Amendment or any other Loan Document to which it is a party or any judgment entered by any court in respect thereof may be brought initially in the federal or state courts in Houston, Texas or in the courts of its own corporate
	domicile and irrevocably submits to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of each such court for the purpose of any such suit, action, proceeding or judgment. This
<B>
	Section&nbsp;5
</B>
	is for the benefit of the Lenders only and, as a result, no Lender
	shall be prevented from taking proceedings in any other courts with jurisdiction. To the extent allowed by applicable Laws, the Lenders may take concurrent proceedings in any number of jurisdictions.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)
<B>
	Waiver of Jury Trial
</B>
	. Each Obligor and each Lender hereby irrevocably waives, to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law,
	any and all right to trial by jury in any suit, action or proceeding arising out of or relating to this Amendment, the other Loan Documents or the transactions contemplated hereby or thereby.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	SECTION&nbsp;6
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Miscellaneous.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
<B>
	No Waiver
</B>
	. Nothing contained herein shall be deemed to
	constitute a waiver of compliance with any term or condition contained in the Loan Agreement or any of the other Loan Documents or constitute a course of conduct or dealing among the parties. Except as expressly stated herein, the Lenders reserve
	all rights, privileges and remedies under the Loan Documents. Except as amended hereby, the Loan Agreement and other Loan Documents remain unmodified and in full force and effect. All references in the Loan Documents to the Loan Agreement shall be
	deemed to be references to the Loan Agreement as amended hereby.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)
<B>
	Severability
</B>
	. In case any provision of or obligation under
	this Amendment shall be invalid, illegal or unenforceable in any jurisdiction, the validity, legality and enforceability of the remaining provisions or obligations, or of such provision or obligation in any other jurisdiction, shall not in any way
	be affected or impaired thereby.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)
<B>
	Headings
</B>
	. Headings and captions used in this Amendment (including the Exhibits, Schedules and
	Annexes hereto, if any) are included for convenience of reference only and shall not be given any substantive effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d)
<B>
	Integration
</B>
	. This Amendment constitutes a Loan Document and, together with the other Loan Documents, incorporates all negotiations of the parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof and is the final expression and agreement of
	the parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e)
<B>
	Counterparts
</B>
	. This Amendment may be executed in any number of
	counterparts, all of which taken together shall constitute one and the same instrument and any of the parties hereto may execute this Amendment by signing any such counterpart.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f)
<B>
	Controlling Provisions
</B>
	. In the event of any inconsistencies between the provisions of this Amendment and the provisions of any
	other Loan Document, the provisions of this Amendment shall govern and prevail. Except as expressly modified by this Amendment, the Loan Documents shall not be modified and shall remain in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	6
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage162"></A>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<I>
	[Remainder of page intentionally left blank]
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have duly executed this Amendment, as of the date first
	above written.
</P>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>

</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	CERTIFICATIONS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	I, R. Bradley Gray,
	certify that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form 10-K of NanoString Technologies, Inc.;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such
	statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the
	registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d&#150;15(e)) and internal
	control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a&#150;15(f) and 15d&#150;15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its
	consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

	financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Date: March&nbsp;11, 2016
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
